description.value:
Dexterity 13

A weapon with this property requires more skill to control. While wielding it, you have disadvantage on attack rolls unless you meet the Dexterity requirement.

Reach

A weapon with this property adds 5 feet to your reach with it.

Shocking 13

When you hit a creature with a weapon with the shocking property, you can force it to make a Dexterity saving throw, DC equal to the shocking number. On a failed save, the creature takes an additional [[/r 1d4]] lightning damage and becomes shocked until the end of its next turn.

Two-handed

A weapon with this property requires two hands to use.
